task.title: Integrating the Plugin with the DITA Open Toolkit
task.shortdesc: This topic includes the procedure for integrating the plugin with the DITA Open Toolkit.

context.p:
The requirements of the plugin for the DITA Open Toolkit are as follows:
Java Virtual Machine 1.6 or newer if you want to use DITA-OT 1.8 or Java Virtual Machine 1.8 or newer if you want to use DITA-OT 2.x.
DITA Open toolkit 1.8 or 2.x (includes Saxon 9.x libraries)
To integrate the plugin with the DITA Open Toolkit, follow these steps:

cmd.ph: Download and install a Java Virtual Machine version compatible with the DITA-OT version.

step.cmd: Download and unpack DITA Open Toolkit 1.8.x or 2.x.
